original_title: 恋愛・コンプレックス
overview: The first in a love pop collection that depicts the sexuality of modern women from a new perspective. A female college student Hitomi Anzai, who is in love with her classmates, rents a rental boy, "Akun," because she fears she is a virgin and seems to be a troublesome woman. As a result, she loses her virginity.
title: Virgin Complex
